snippet.title: The City Of Time, 时间之城, 時間の城
snippet.description:
The City Of Time, 时间之城, 時間の城

The little girl comes to the City of Time, this place has the magic of making time back, you can use the magic of time backward to make time interlaced to help the little girl through difficulties. Your actions mean the route when the time goes backwards. Once make mistakes, they will be irreversible, you need to use your brain to make full use of the time back and the appropriate course of action to pass the level successfully

Hello, this is my independent game, the story tells about a little girl who comes to the City of Time, and use the backward and the interlacement of time to  pull through one after another difficulties. Everyone is welcome to give valuable comments and own ideas on my game. You can contact me in the menu of the game. I hope everyone can enjoy my game, thank you.

《时间之城》是一款益智解密游戏，玩家操作小女孩控制时间的流逝、倒流、免疫时间寻找一个合适的契机收集花瓣能量，充满能量的花瓣将指引女孩去下一个地方。合理安排自己的路线，在合适的地方免疫时间倒流，靠你自己的智慧去帮助小女孩。

游戏简介：
     1.操作时间，通过对时间的流逝，倒流，让自身免疫对时间的倒流来造成时间交错通关，画面配色清爽
     2.画面配色清爽

您好，这是我的独立游戏，欢迎大家对我的游戏提出宝贵的意见和您们自己的想法，可以在游戏关于菜单中联系我，希望大家能喜欢我的游戏，谢谢。
